channel.title: Where to install guest addtions, host or guest?
channel.description: Where to do the installation for guest addition? Host (Ubuntu) or guest (Whonix)? I download the update in host or guest?

item.title: Where to install guest addtions, host or guest?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Guest additions are always installed inside guest. Documentation can be found here:
http://kkkkkkkkkk63ava6.onion/wiki/VirtualBox_Guest_Additions

Read full topic
item.source: Where to install guest addtions, host or guest?
